data.title: Silicon Publishing, Inc. on LinkedIn: The long game of generative AI: Adobe sets the standard
data.meta_description: ü§ñ #Midjourney, #StableDiffusion, #DALL-E ‚Äî generative AI art models are on everyone's lips. But who has the intellectual property rights to the images?‚Ä¶
data.text:
For nearly 20 years, Silicon Designer has been the tool of choice for online design. In its latest version, Designer makes it easy to see your 2D artwork on any 3D object. Visualize and explore product designs on shirts, hats, glasses, mugs, posters, you name it. Now any product can use state-of-the-art 3D visualization to engage customers with Silicon Designer 3D. Request a demo: https://cutt.ly/negFwlh5 #DesignInnovation #3DVisualization #ProductDesign #SiliconDesigner #CustomerEngagement

Where do you get the power to create documents at scale? üí™ Our solutions open the door to hassle-free content editing and data-driven publishing ‚Äì either stand-alone or as a unified solution: üîπ #SiliconDesigner: manages flexible InDesign documents so your team can add content while preserving the design and layout integrity. üîπ #SiliconPaginator: boosts document throughput by intelligently flowing data through adaptive templates where text, charts, and tables automatically find their proper place. Read more: https://cutt.ly/deuMS4pG #DatabasePublishing #VDPSolutions #PublishingSystems #AutomationSolutions #DigitalPublishingSystem #PrepressAutomation

#SiliconDesigner is a white-label document editor you can easily make your own. With an entirely customizable user interface, it integrates with shopping carts and other systems. Based on Adobe technologies, #Designer offers the highest quality print and graphic output. And with its extensibility, output is easily optimized for print (PDF job options) and web delivery (device-specific formats/resolution). It only takes a minute to book your #Designer demo ‚è∞‚û°Ô∏è https://cutt.ly/MeoG2dHQ #PrintingIndustry #PrintTechnology #Web2PrintSoftware #WebToPrintSoftware #PrinterVerse #MarketingAutomationSoftware

Every sales professional, software developer and even a few CEOs can tell their stories about struggling with complex documents, invitations, and marketing collateral ‚Äî the list is endless. And what was their first step? Take a guess: they probably started by googling "creating an online design" üîéüëÄ But there‚Äôs a better way ‚Äî just use #SiliconDesigner's WYSIWYG (what you see is what you get) technology. With an online library of flexible Adobe InDesign templates, it‚Äôs easy to create brilliant documents for digital output or print in just minutes. You don‚Äôt need glitter to make your design ‚ú® shine ‚ú® ‚Äî just book a #Designer demo: https://cutt.ly/MeoG2dHQ #WYSIWYG #OnlineDesign #OnlineEditing #ContentCreation #CreativityForAll

Retail, like most economic sectors, is becoming increasingly technological as e-commerce dominates the market. Sales documents are also moving ahead with the times. Your competitors might already be using AI with automated publishing solutions like #SiliconPaginator to create everything from personalized cards or multi-page catalogs, to the most important legal documents like itemized invoices, large financial reports, and complex contracts. With its intelligent content management in flexible InDesign templates, #Paginator makes the whole process a breeze, while its native AI looks for gaps and fills them with relevant content. üèîüöµ Reach new heights with the #Paginator demo: https://cutt.ly/JeiwN6xn #Retail #RetailDocumentation #Sales #SalesDocumentation #BusinessDocumentation

#AdobeExpress impresses with its image manipulation, including generative AI and a variety of brand-new text effects. But is there another way to avoid the back-and-forth between #Express and your favorite design applications? üßêüí≠ The answer is YES! üòç‚ú® We'll help you integrate #Express with #SiliconDesigner or other favorites, to take advantage of all the best options via a single interface, like #Designer's online editing features with #Express's AI-removing background in the same project. Read more and request a demo here: https://cutt.ly/peiG3uOv #Adobe #Express #AI #ArtificialIntelligence #MachineLearning #Technology #Tech #Innovation
